      • setId

        public final void setId(java.lang.String id)
        Set id for layer
        Parameters:
        id - - Id to assign to the layer. If not assigned, esri.Map assigns value.

      • setImageServiceParameters

        public final void setImageServiceParameters(ImageServiceParameters imageServiceParameters)
        Set ImageServiceParameters for layer
        Parameters:
        imageServiceParameters - - The image service parameter options used when exporting an Image Service layer.

      • setOpacity

        public final void setOpacity(double opacity)
        Set opacity for layer
        Parameters:
        opacity - - Initial opacity or transparency of layer. Values range from 0.0 to 1.0, where 0.0 is 100% transparent and 1.0 has no transparency. The default value is 1.0.

      • useMapTime

        public final void useMapTime(boolean useMapTime)
        Set the useMapTime parameter.
        Parameters:
        useMapTime - - When true, the layer will update its content based on the map's time extent. The default values is true.

      • setVisible

        public final void setVisible(boolean isVisible)
        Set visible
        Parameters:
        isVisible - - Initial visibility of the layer. Default is true.
